comment: The ring of integers restricted to the even integers is a (non-unital) ring, the "ring of even integers". Alternate version of ~ 2zrng , based on a restriction of the field of the complex numbers. The proof is based on the facts that the ring of even integers is an additive abelian group (see ~ 2zrngaabl ) and a multiplicative semigroup (see ~ 2zrngmsgrp ). (Contributed by AV, 11-Feb-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
